languages.text: {n}Эмелина склоняет голову.{/n} "Сторонний эксперимент. Возможность измученным и запуганным людям найти утешение в высшей силе. Впрочем, я повелела остановить службы — несколько человек поддалить тлетворному влиянию атмосферы и сошли с ума, в чем винили голоса из вокса".

{n}Emelina bows her head.{/n} "A side experiment. A way for exhausted and frightened people to find comfort in a higher power. However, I had the services stopped — several people succumbed to the pernicious influence of the atmosphere and went insane, but the people blamed it on the voices from the vox."
languages.original_text: {n}Эмелина склоняет голову.{/n} "Сторонний эксперимент. Возможность измученным и запуганным людям найти утешение в высшей силе. Впрочем, я повелела остановить службы — несколько человек поддалить тлетворному влиянию атмосферы и сошли с ума, в чем винили голоса из вокса".

However, I had the services stopped — several people succumbed to the pernicious influence of the atmosphere and went insane, but the people blamed it on the voices from the vox."

languages.text: {n}艾米莉娜低下了头。{/n}“那只是个附属性的实验，让那些疲惫不堪、心怀恐惧的人们在更强大的力量面前找到慰藉。不过，我早就把这个实验中止了。之前，有几个人受到了这颗行星邪恶氛围的毒害，最终精神错乱了，可人们却将其归咎于录音里的声音。”
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina bows her head.{/n} "A side experiment. A way for exhausted and frightened people to find comfort in a higher power. However, I had the services stopped — several people succumbed to the pernicious influence of the atmosphere and went insane, but the people blamed it on the voices from the vox."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾米莉娜低下了头。{/n}“那只是个附属性的实验，让那些疲惫不堪、心怀恐惧的人们在更强大的力量面前找到慰藉。不过，我早就把这个实验中止了。之前，有几个人受到了这颗行星邪恶氛围的毒害，最终精神错乱了，可人们却将其归咎于录音里的声音。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Un pequeño experimento. Una forma de que unas personas agotadas y aterradas encontraran consuelo en un poder superior. Sin embargo, detuve los servicios, ya que hubo quien sucumbió a la influencia envenenada de la atmósfera y perdió el juicio, pero la gente lo achacó a las voces del voco».
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina bows her head.{/n} "A side experiment. A way for exhausted and frightened people to find comfort in a higher power. However, I had the services stopped — several people succumbed to the pernicious influence of the atmosphere and went insane, but the people blamed it on the voices from the vox."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Un pequeño experimento. Una forma de que unas personas agotadas y aterradas encontraran consuelo en un poder superior. Sin embargo, detuve los servicios, ya que hubo quien sucumbió a la influencia envenenada de la atmósfera y perdió el juicio, pero la gente lo achacó a las voces del voco».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}エメリナは頭を下げる。{/n}「サブの実験。疲れ果てて怯えている人々が上位の力で安らぎを得る方法。しかし、私はサービスを停止させた。数名が大気の有害な影響に屈して発狂したが、人々はそれをヴォクスからの声のせいだと非難した」
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina bows her head.{/n} "A side experiment. A way for exhausted and frightened people to find comfort in a higher power. However, I had the services stopped — several people succumbed to the pernicious influence of the atmosphere and went insane, but the people blamed it on the voices from the vox."

traits.locale_text: {n}エメリナは頭を下げる。{/n}「サブの実験。疲れ果てて怯えている人々が上位の力で安らぎを得る方法。しかし、私はサービスを停止させた。数名が大気の有害な影響に屈して発狂したが、人々はそれをヴォクスからの声のせいだと非難した」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina incline la tête.{/n} « Une expérience annexe. Une manière pour les gens exténués et effrayés de trouver du réconfort dans une puissance supérieure. Cela dit, j'ai préféré mettre fin aux messes. Plusieurs personnes ont succombé à l'influence pernicieuse de l'atmosphère et ont sombré dans la folie, mais les autres ont mis ça sur le compte des voix issues du vox. »
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina bows her head.{/n} "A side experiment. A way for exhausted and frightened people to find comfort in a higher power. However, I had the services stopped — several people succumbed to the pernicious influence of the atmosphere and went insane, but the people blamed it on the voices from the vox."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina incline la tête.{/n} « Une expérience annexe. Une manière pour les gens exténués et effrayés de trouver du réconfort dans une puissance supérieure. Cela dit, j'ai préféré mettre fin aux messes. Plusieurs personnes ont succombé à l'influence pernicieuse de l'atmosphère et ont sombré dans la folie, mais les autres ont mis ça sur le compte des voix issues du vox. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina senkt den Kopf.{/n} "Ein Nebenexperiment. Eine Möglichkeit für erschöpfte und verängstigte Menschen, Trost bei einer höheren Macht zu finden. Ich habe den Dienst allerdings beendet – einige erlagen dem negativen Einfluss der Atmosphäre und verloren den Verstand, aber die Menschen machten die Stimmen aus dem Vox dafür verantwortlich."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina bows her head.{/n} "A side experiment. A way for exhausted and frightened people to find comfort in a higher power. However, I had the services stopped — several people succumbed to the pernicious influence of the atmosphere and went insane, but the people blamed it on the voices from the vox."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina senkt den Kopf.{/n} "Ein Nebenexperiment. Eine Möglichkeit für erschöpfte und verängstigte Menschen, Trost bei einer höheren Macht zu finden. Ich habe den Dienst allerdings beendet – einige erlagen dem negativen Einfluss der Atmosphäre und verloren den Verstand, aber die Menschen machten die Stimmen aus dem Vox dafür verantwortlich."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bir yan proje. Yorgun ve korkmuş insanların daha üst bir güçte huzur bulabilmesini sağlayan bir yöntem. Hizmetleri durdurmuştum. Bunun üzerine kimileri, atmosferin kötücül havasına maruz kalarak delirdi. Bunun için de vokstan gelen sesleri suçluyorlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina bows her head.{/n} "A side experiment. A way for exhausted and frightened people to find comfort in a higher power. However, I had the services stopped — several people succumbed to the pernicious influence of the atmosphere and went insane, but the people blamed it on the voices from the vox."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bir yan proje. Yorgun ve korkmuş insanların daha üst bir güçte huzur bulabilmesini sağlayan bir yöntem. Servisin durmasını sağladım ve bazı insanlar atmosferin kötücül nüfuzuna maruz kalarak delirdi ama bunun için vokstan gelen sesleri suçluyorlar."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
